name: PoCake_landing_page
description: Landing page for PoCake using the bulma starter repo made by Jeremy Thomas
author: Alchematrix <alchematrix0@gmail.com>

scripts.css-deploy: npm run css-build && npm run css-postcss
scripts.netlify-build: mkdir build && cp -r css ./build/css && cp -r lib build/lib && cp -r assets build/assets && cp *.html ./build/
scripts.create-build: cp -r css ./build/css && cp -r lib build/lib && cp -r assets build/assets && cp *.html ./build/
scripts.deploy: npm run css-deploy && npm run js-build && npm run create-build
scripts.start: npm run css-watch | npm run js-watch
scripts.netlify: npm run css-deploy && npm run js-build && npm run netlify-build
